channel.title: Posts on the void
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on the void

item.title: Can't Sleep, Can't Connect
item.description: I’ve tried everything to fall asleep. Magnesium, breathing exercises, sleeping gummies, ashwagandha, even fever meds. Nothing works. My brain won’t shut the fuck up, racing through thoughts I can’t even remember because they’re so cluttered and chaotic. I focus on my breathing, imagine peaceful places, count backwards from 100. I tire myself out at the gym. None of it changes anything. I barely sleep, then drag myself to the office. Rinse and repeat.

item.title: about this blog
item.description:
what is this place?

this is where i dump whatever’s in my head. no tech stuff. no tutorials. no trying to sound smart.

just me being… human? maybe. or maybe documenting the descent into madness. who knows.

some days i’ll rant about random shit. some days i’ll be at my lowest, typing through the chaos. some days i might actually make sense.

this is my outlet. my documentation. my proof that i existed and felt things.
